name: Skylanders SWAP Force™
description: Embark on an exciting new adventure with the Skylanders and the SWAP Force. For generations, the SWAP Force protected the volcano that replenishes Skylands’ magic. That is until an epic battle caught them in an eruption that blasted them apart, sent them to Earth and gave them the ability swap powers. Only you can mix and match their tops and bottoms, put them on the new Portal of Power and help save Skylands. Starter Pack includes: 1-Video Game, 1-Portal of Power, 3-Skylanders Figures, 1-Character Collector Poster, 3-Sticker Sheets with Secret Codes and 3-Trading Cards. *For users retrieving their SWAP Force Wii U™ download: - Redemption Requires Broadband Internet Connection, Broadband Provider charges may apply. - Coupon Code expires on October 31, 2016. Coupon Code is redeemable only at the Nintendo eShop. - Requires SWAP Force Wii™ Starter Pack portal and toys. Download contains game only. While supplies last.
